name: Vegan Apple Crisp
description: This is the best Vegan Apple Crisp ever! Packed with perfectly sweetened and tender apples, topped with a buttery, crispy oat mixture and best served with a scoop of dairy free vanilla ice cream and a drizzle of caramel.
recipeIngredient: 6  large apples (about 4 lbs), peeled, cored and chopped small

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly spray a 9 X 13 casserole dish with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly spray a 9 X 13 casserole dish with oil.

itemListElement.text: Peel, core and chop the apples into thin, small pieces. This will help them get tender in the oven! Place the apples in a large bowl and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Peel, core and chop the apples into thin, small pieces. This will help them get tender in the oven! Place the apples in a large bowl and set aside.

itemListElement.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together the melted vegan butter with the 3 tablespoons of flour, then add the water, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon and salt and mix until smooth.
itemListElement.name: In a medium bowl, whisk together the melted vegan butter with the 3 tablespoons of flour, then add the water, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon and salt and mix until smooth.

itemListElement.text: Pour the mixture over the apples and mix well to coat. Dump the apples into the casserole dish and spread evenly. Set aside and prepare the topping.
itemListElement.name: Pour the mixture over the apples and mix well to coat. Dump the apples into the casserole dish and spread evenly. Set aside and prepare the topping.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, brown sugar, oats, cinnamon, baking powder and salt to combine.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, brown sugar, oats, cinnamon, baking powder and salt to combine.

itemListElement.text: Using clean fingers or a pastry cutter, work the softened vegan butter or coconut oil into the flour mixture until well combined. Sprinkle evenly over the apples in the dish.
itemListElement.name: Using clean fingers or a pastry cutter, work the softened vegan butter or coconut oil into the flour mixture until well combined. Sprinkle evenly over the apples in the dish.

itemListElement.text: Place in the center rack of the oven and bake for about 45 minutes, until the top is golden brown and the apples are tender. It should be bubbling, especially on the sides.
itemListElement.name: Place in the center rack of the oven and bake for about 45 minutes, until the top is golden brown and the apples are tender. It should be bubbling, especially on the sides.

itemListElement.text: Serve warm with a scoop of non-dairy vanilla ice cream and vegan caramel, if desired. Enjoy!
